categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The freighter Luke Skywalker took on his return to Tatooine seeking blockade runners for the Rebellion was a round ship capable of transporting a X-34 landspeeder. Unfortunately, despite putting a camouflage cover over the freighter, it ended up salvaged by Jawas.
Though this vessel is barely glimpsed in the story, it may resemble a YT-1300 light freighter.
